title: Lagging in our server!
body: In many games that i have played even with my friends or by myself i had an unknown lagg on my gaming. It was not my FPS or my Ping! they were absolutely fine between 40-80 FPS and 60-100 Ping. Please could you fix that so we can love our game even more and enjoy it? Thank you very much and hope you will change it.

replies.body:
We need someone who's tech savvy to analyse the situation and provide a detailed report to Riot about what's happening. Otherwise nothing will be done about it.

Not to say that Riot should have been doing this internally, though. Unless they encountered it and thought it was worth the trade-off for whatever it is they introduced.
i agree with you 100% but i assume that if they want us to enjoy our gaming time and have fun, then they need to fix this problem.

yes, me too i have the same problem as well. Some times my screen just freeze and then starts again in both of my computers or some other times is just lag. Riot can you please fix this unknown lag problem {{item:3151}} {{item:3070}}  
THANK YOU !
